-- many changes as described here: http://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/25208/some-more-fixes
-- Post form improved
-- Super pretty captcha buttons
-- Pretty checkboxes
-- Mad respec to my boy

v 3.1

-- Added support for /b/ackwash tooltips
